0.title: Uria, Lord of Searing Flames
0.effect: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by sending 3 face-up Trap Cards from your side of the field to the Graveyard. Increase the ATK of this card by 1000 points for each Continuous Trap Card in your Graveyard. Once per turn, you can destroy 1 Set Spell or Trap Card on your opponent's side of the field. Spell and Trap Cards cannot be activated in response to this effect's activation.

3.title: Turbo Booster
3.effect: If you have Normal Summoned a monster this turn, you can Special Summon this card from your hand. You can Tribute this card to destroy 1 monster your opponent controls that battled one of your monsters this turn.

6.title: Consecrated Light
6.effect: Neither player can Normal or Special Summon DARK monsters or declare an attack with a DARK monster. This card cannot be destroyed by battle with a DARK monster, and you take no Battle Damage from that battle.

9.title: Copy Plant
9.effect: Once per turn, you can select 1 face-up Plant-Type monster on the field to have this card's Level become equal to the selected monster's Level, until the End Phase.

12.title: Mucus Yolk
12.effect: This card may attack your opponent directly. Each time this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent's Life Points, increase the ATK of this card by 1000 points during your next Standby Phase. The ATK increase lasts as long as this card remains face-up on the field.

0.title: Jinzo #7
0.effect: This monster may attack your opponent directly.

1.title: Larvae Moth
1.effect: This monster cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned by Tributing "Petit Moth" on the 2nd of your turns after "Petit Moth" has been equipped with "Cocoon of Evolution".

2.title: Hoshiningen
2.effect: As long as this card remains face-up on the Field, increase the ATK of all LIGHT monsters by 500 points and decrease the ATK of all DARK monsters by 400 points.

3.title: Flip Flop Frog
3.effect: Once per turn, you can flip this card into face-down Defense Position. When this card is flipped face-up, you can return monsters your opponent controls to their owners' hand up to the number of face-up "Frog" monsters you control, except "Frog the Jam".

4.title: Scarr, Scout of Dark World
4.effect: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, add 1 Level 4 or lower monster that includes "Dark World" in its card name from your Deck to your hand.

5.title: Scarr, Scout of Dark World
5.effect: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, add 1 Level 4 or lower monster that includes "Dark World" in its card name from your Deck to your hand.

6.title: Earthbound Spirit
6.effect: A vengeful creature formed by the spirits of fallen warriors, it drags any who dares to approach it to the deepest bowels of the earth.

7.title: Whirlwind Weasel
7.effect: FLIP: Your opponent cannot activate any Spell or Trap Cards for the rest of this turn.

8.title: Man Beast of Ares
8.effect: After a Chain (of 2 or more Links) resolves, this card gains 500 ATK.

9.title: Comrade Swordsman of Landstar
9.effect: All Warrior-Type monsters you control gain 400 ATK.

10.title: Alien Ammonite
10.effect: When this card is Normal Summoned, you can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Alien" monster from your Graveyard. The monster Special Summoned by this effect is destroyed during the End Phase.

11.title: Time Wizard
11.effect: Toss a coin and call it. If you call it right, destroy all monsters on your opponent's side of the field. If you call it wrong, destroy all monsters on your side of the field, and you lose Life Points equal to half the total ATK of the destroyed monsters. You can only use this effect once per turn, during your Main Phase.

12.title: Ojama Black
12.effect: He's one of the Ojama Trio. It's said that he butts in by any means necessary. It's also said that when the three are together, something happens.
